Author: BirdsEatMyBrain
Text: Thank you. Reading this made me feel a bit better. Sorry for replying late!

Author: Ste_382
Text: Try to remember, this is exactly what mass advertising wants you to feel. 'Buy our clothes, feel prettier! But the visual standard we set is impossible to meet, so buy more and more in an attempt to attain the impossible! Then we've got you!'  I try to remember that when I see those kinds of things, and tell myself I won't be manipulated for the sake of clothes just so some big shot can get richer.  Doesn't always work, but it's no less true. I hope you can enjoy your outings for your S/O's birthday! You are in no way a waste of space, and you're in no way at fault for occupying your body just the way it is
